name: Ice Cream Trip
description:
Ice Cream Trip is a small arcade game where you control (well, you try to) an soft ice cream against all the dangers that could happen to ice creams.
With its intuitive one touch control, you will try to stay as long as possible on top of the cone.

Features:
- Fun squishy physics
- 10+ flavors to unlock
- Share your high scores with your friends
- Cheerful and summery vibes all year long
